name: Hide Schedule Task Via Index Value Tamper
description: Detects when the "index" value of a scheduled task is modified from the registry. Which effectively hides it from any tooling such as "schtasks /query" (Read the referenced link for more information about the effects of this technique)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\* AND registry.path:*Index* AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000000\))`
